name: Through The Door
description:
Created for a game jam! 48 hours, solo, no brakes.

I wanted to make a roguelike shooter with (very overpowered) weapon upgrades. Clear each stage to unlock the doors, then kick one open to get its upgrades and proceed to the next stage.

Shoot: LMB / Right Trigger

Jump: Space / South face button

Dash: Shift / East face button

Kick door: E / West face button

I might add a little more to this, since I've done a bunch of the legwork for stuff like grenades, splitting projectiles, and so forth.

But I'm pretty happy with it as is, even if you can't die (:

The WebGL build is kinda broken, so you’ll probably want to download this.
